bibl.title: Ergamenes and the Priests of Amun.
bibl.note: Non vidimus. Cf. APh 40 (1971) p. 569: "The decline of Napata and the ascendency of Meroe as the Kushite capital was probably a result of Ergamenes' overthrow of the Amun priests of Napata in the early 3rd cent. B.C."
bibl.seg: Law R.C.C., Ergamenes and the Priests of Amun.

Non vidimus. Cf. APh 40 (1971) p. 569: "The decline of Napata and the ascendency of Meroe as the Kushite capital was probably a result of Ergamenes' overthrow of the Amun priests of Napata in the early 3rd cent. B.C."
